english: In music, sam's passion was mozart .
chinese: 在音乐方面，萨姆钟情于莫扎特。

english: Slipping off his overalls, he dived in .
chinese: 他脱掉衣裤，一头扎进水里。

english: He had rolled a handkerchief round his head .
The program includes two mozart sonatas .
chinese: 节目单中有两首莫扎特的奏鸣曲。

english: I can feel a nail sticking into my shoe .
chinese: 我觉得有钉子扎进鞋里。
扎造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: The gangster stabbed an innocent person to death ..
chinese: 歹徒扎死了一名无辜者。

english: The emotion communicated itself to bazarov .
chinese: 这情感也传染到巴扎洛夫身上了。

english: She felt a pricking on her scalp .
chinese: 她感到头皮上被扎了一下。

english: Arkady was wounded by bazarov's cynicism .
chinese: 巴扎洛夫的冷言冷语伤害了阿尔卡狄。

english: He brandished a sheaf of documents .
chinese: 他手里挥舞着一扎文件。

english: She spread out her arms , not knowing what to do .
chinese: 她扎煞着手，不知该干什么。

english: Dash it! i've got a puncture in my bicycle tyre .
chinese: 糟糕！我的自行车轮胎扎破了。

english: I have got a puncture and my spare is flat too !
chinese: 我的车胎扎破了，备用的也瘪了。

english: Mozart is dead but his music lives on .
chinese: 莫扎特人已死，但他的音乐作品却万世流传。

english: She finds his beard too bristly .
chinese: 她觉得他的胡须太扎人。
